extracted_playbook.title: Identify Current Product Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the current version of the product to assess vulnerability to the listed CVEs.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which product version is currently installed?

extracted_playbook.title: No Action Required for Versions Earlier than 20.3
extracted_playbook.description: Versions earlier than 20.3 are not affected by the listed CVEs.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.3
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 20.3.4 for CVE-2023-20034 and 20.3.7 for CVE-2023-20262.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Versions 20.4 and 20.5
extracted_playbook.description: Migrate to a fixed release to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.6
Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.7
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 20.7.1 for CVE-2023-20253 and CVE-2023-20034.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.8
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 20.8.1 for CVE-2023-20253 and migrate to a fixed release for CVE-2023-20254 and CVE-2023-20262.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.9
Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.10
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 20.10.1 for CVE-2023-20253 and 20.10.1.2 for CVE-2023-20254.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.11
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 20.11.1 for CVE-2023-20253 and 20.11.1.2 for CVE-2023-20254, and 20.11.1 for CVE-2023-20262.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Fixed Release for Version 20.12
